Name: SPI_SS_N
True ('1'): Set the SS_N signal to high
False ('0'): Set the SS_N signal to low

Name: SPI_SCLK
True ('1'): Set the SCLK signal to high
False ('0'): Set the SCLK signal to low

Name: SPI_CONTROL
True ('1'): Enable manual control of the SPI. ``SPI_SS_N_STATUS`` and ``SPI_SCLK_STATUS`` are only valid when ``SPI_CONTROL`` is true and the selected channels are not busy.
False ('0'): Disable manual control of the SPI

Name: SPI_CPOL
True ('1'): IDLE state of the SCLK signal is logic high
False ('0'): IDLE signal of the SCLK signal is logic low

Name: SPI_CPHA
True ('1'): Sample on the second edge of SCLK
False ('0'): Sample on the first edge of SCLK
